__doc__: This file contains a list of parameters to be substituted into
template files by the geni-install-templates program.
Each parameter has a name (to be matched against @X@ in the
template file). A default may be provided, in which case
the value is optional. Otherwise the value is required.

__parameters__.name: ch_admin_email
__parameters__.doc: Name of email address to configure in service certs

__parameters__.name: ch_cert_name
__parameters__.doc: SSL certificate file for Apache to front CH host

__parameters__.name: ch_key_name
__parameters__.doc: SSL private key file for Apache to front CH host

__parameters__.name: ch_host
__parameters__.doc: SSL private key file for Apache to front CH host

__parameters__.name: pkglogdir
__parameters__.doc: Directory into which CH writes log files

__parameters__.name: pkgdatadir
__parameters__.doc: Directory root in which CH data files are installed

__parameters__.name: pkgsysconfdir
__parameters__.doc: Name of location of system config files
